main event: A military observation reported seeing an unidentified object resembling a fireball at Columbus AFB, Mississippi on December 19, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright yellow color with a fiery tail resembling a comet., Witnesses compared the object to an ion trail and noted it turned off its afterburner as it reached the northern horizon., The sighting lasted between 5 to 20 seconds., Observers included air traffic control personnel with over 15 years of experience., The object was reported to travel at incredibly high speeds, estimated at over 10,000 miles per hour.
